name: I am Surgeon - General Surgery & Crazy Doctor
name_original: I am Surgeon - General Surgery & Crazy Doctor
description:
Welcome to General Surgery & Crazy Doctor, be the best surgeon at our surgical hospital!
It's a free kids doctor game! Fun for your casual family time! Here you can be a little surgeon, face with kinds of surgical problems, and cure your poor patients. Be a nice surgeon, please!

Game Features:
- Realistic hospital hall with many patients
- Versatile professional surgery tools
- Simple to operate and cure patients easily
- A lot of surgery levels to explore
- Each patient has different challenges
- 8 mini games to win gems and free trail of locked surgery tools!
(8 mini games are: candy crush, hit it, fly bird, cute jump, special one, fishing, brick breaker, darts)

I am Surgeon - General Surgery & Crazy Doctor is a surgeon mania game, surgeon game with real hospital hall, and fun game for all ages.

Do you want to cure a injured Alien monster or a suffering Ninja? Now you can achieve your dream to be a super little surgeon!
Have you ever seen an alien monster? His UFO made a forced landing here. Doctor! Only you can save him!
The ninja looks terrible. It seems he didn't complete his mission. Little surgeon! Please cure him first! Try your best to finish a perfect surgery!
--- Take care of your pitiful patients, don’t be a crazy surgeon!

Wow, such a fantastic surgeon game!
Get it Now!
